Text:
Mitsugoshi is launching a major Valentine's Day
campaign again this year.

Epsilon has once again been asked by Gamma, who is
spearheading the campaign, to help with an event—

Gamma said she wants me to help her out with
something. I wonder what it is.

Well, when it comes to baking sweets, I'm the best in
the Shadow Garden. For a Valentine's Day event,
it's only fitting that she would ask me.
Also—

She sent me these adorable clothes... Heehee, she
wants me to wear this for the campaign, huh.

Oh, maybe this event is a chance to showcase my
beauty to the very fullest. If so, I'll have to pull out
all the stops!

I'd definitely like to personally give my lord my
handmade chocolate...heehee.

I'd like to give it to him in a romantic setting,
when it's just the two of us, and not in public.

Likely everyone is getting ready to give him chocolate,
but what kind should I give him?

Mitsugoshi has made so many types of chocolate this
year that it's hard to pick...

Only handmade chocolate will do! Store-bought isn't
enough to convey my true feelings.
I've been gathering a variety of recipes for ideas...

Hmm...simple might be best, but perhaps adding
liqueur to give it a refined taste may be good too.

Oh, this recipe might be delicious. Citrus goes well
with chocolate, doesn't it?

In the past couple of years, there's been an increase
in the variety of chocolate recipes. Even children are
making their own these days.

...Ah! So maybe everyone in Shadow Garden is also
thinking of giving him handmade chocolate.

Heehee, but...I don't think anyone can beat me when
it comes to baking. I'm sure my lord will prefer my
chocolates over everyone else's.
Please have my chocolates, my lord!

Oh, Epsilon, your chocolate even puts the
professionals to shame. I'd love to try some.

Oh, not at all! I'm not that good yet, but I'm so
glad you like them!
Um, if you like, you can have me...with the chocolate.
Really? I'd be more than happy to...
Or something like that?! Heehee!

Ah, but...there's one rival I need to be wary of.
She's a perfect storm of ditzy and flirtatious...

Heehee! But of course...it's me who wins in
the end, right?

I'm going to end my long battle with that ditz,
and I'm going to do it on Valentine's Day!

...Oh, right! Gamma invited me to a meeting about
Mitsugoshi's Valentine's Day campaign.

She said she had a request for me. I wonder what
it is...
Did you prepare what I asked for, Nu?

Yes, after much hardship, we managed to get it.
I'm sure that our lord will be satisfied with it.

Hmm...I wasn't sure if I could get it at one point,
but it looks like I can fulfill our lord's wishes.

It's a special item, and it must be kept in the
underground vault for safekeeping until the
day we hand it over, do you understand?
Understood, Lady Gamma.
...Wow.

They're going to give something to our lord...?
What were they just talking about?
Ah!

If they're giving a precious gift to him at this time
of year, it must be...chocolate, right?

I disregarded Gamma when it came to making sweets,
but as director of Mitsugoshi, she's skilled
at gathering information and sourcing products.

Maybe she took full advantage of her status to obtain
special chocolates that aren't available to the public.

Even if the chocolate they got was made by a famous
pâtisserie, I don't think I'd lose, but...

What's with this feeling of uncertainty? My chocolate
is second to none. Be more confident, Epsilon!
That night—

I-I'm not worried one bit, but...I am curious about
what kind of chocolate Gamma got.

There's no doubt that my chocolate is the best.
But...you know...anyone would at least want to
check it out, right?

Muttering excuses, Epsilon works her way to where the
vault is, in the deepest part of Mitsugoshi.
Epsilon?
What're you doing here in the middle of the night?

L-Let me explain. I'm here for the Valentine's Day
campaign. I'm here on company errands...?
Hahaha.

You should've come to my office if you had errands.
There's just a vault down here, you know?

Uh...all right, to be honest, I overheard you talking
to Nu today about the special item you're giving
to our lord.

Heh...you shouldn't be eavesdropping like that,
Epsilon.

I-I wasn't eavesdropping! I just happened
to...overhear!
So...what is the special item?
...That's a secret.
You have nothing to hide in the Seven Shadows, right?

Only if it's about a mission. But this concerns our
lord's private life, and I can't talk about it with
someone who has nothing to do with it.
I see...
Epsilon stands taller.
Then I'll go ahead, even if I have to use force.

...Fine. I'll take you on. Don't think I'm just going
to let you waltz through...!
...That's not fair.
Huh...?

It's not fair you get your own special chocolates to
please our lord just because you can't compete with
my homemade ones!
...What? I have no clue what you're getting at.

You used your high-up position at Mitsugoshi to get
special chocolate that's not on the market, right?!
What...?

It seems you're mistaken, and I want to fix this...
I'm sure our lord will forgive me under the
circumstances.

Follow me so that I can show you the special item in
the vault.

Epsilon was astounded as Gamma opened the tightly
locked vault door. Inside, there was—
A stuffed bear...? Did our lord say he wanted this?

...Yes. Stuffed bears are quite popular right now
and hard to find. People also resell them at high
prices.
But why would our lord want this...?
...You don't know why?

...No idea. He didn't tell me anything. He just
gazed at me with a serious look on his face,
and asked if I could get one.
It seems our lord can see some quality that we can't.

True. And maybe the Cult of Diablos is involved in
the production and distribution of them.

I bet he's trying to figure it out all by himself
once again... Probably because he's a kind
person who doesn't want us to worry on
Valentine's Day...
Yes, he's so warm-hearted.

If that's the case, maybe we should just leave it to
him and enjoy Valentine's Day!

After saying this, Epsilon and Gamma smile at
each other and gently close the vault door.

But...if I hide my chocolate in this stuffed animal,
it'll give me the best chance to give it to my
lord...right?

Yeah. And even if I wanted to give him chocolate,
it'd be hard to plan it so that it's just the two of
us, right?

Oh, is that stuffed animal holding something? Is it
chocolate...? I wonder who it's from.
Heehee, did you notice something?

You must have something weighing on your mind again,
right, my lord?

...It's all right. You don't have to say anything
now.

You know, if my sweet gift could help heal my lord
even just a tiny bit... I added something extra
special to it.
Epsilon...that's so considerate of you... Thanks.
Oh, it's quite all right...
Epsilon!
My lord! ...And then both of us embrace right there!

Epsilon! You're still standing there... What are you
doing?!

Ack! It was just a joke! I swear! I wasn't trying to
get a head start on you!

I don't want to hear any excuses! We're going to my
office.

Yes, ma'am... Ah, I guess I'll just have to play fair
to give chocolates to my lord.
